item.title: 0837 Javascript Template Literals JSON to HTML
item.description: link: LearnWebCode Youtube JavaScript Template Literals JSON to HTML In 40 minutes, the excellent Brad Schiff (LearnWebCode) covers map function, JSON & converts JSON data about pets into style cards.
